p: MaxLike should be further tested, as has been done with other algorithms, in order to assess its performance in ecological niche modeling. We think it is an interesting addition to the wide spectrum of tools available for projecting the distribution of species into future scenarios of climate change. For species distribution modeling, MaxLike and other models that are based on an explicit sampling process [ 54, 55] should be considered important alternatives to the widely used MaxEnt framework [ 53].
